titleStmt.title: Certamen elegiacum nouem musarum, Appoline duce, contra Barbariem susceptum & serenissimæ, potentissimæq[ue] principi, ac Dominæ, D. Elizabethæ, Angliæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ Reginæ, &c. Barbariæ victrici: Dominæ elementissimæ, D.D.D. Matthias Leius, Germanus.
titleStmt.author: Leius, Matthias.
